attributes.action: WE MUST STOP THE WORKING TAX CREDIT CUTS
attributes.additional_details:
From 6th April 2012 to continue getting WORKING TAX CREDIT couples with children must work 24 HOURS a week between them.

This change will harm families all over the UK, and force people into more poverty.

People working less than 24 HOURS cannot and will not force employers to provide added hours, that don't already exist in the workplace,these changes will see families facing major financial hardship upon losing WORKING TAX CREDIT ELEMENTS.

The Government MUST be forced into a U-TURN on this before 6th April 2012
